descriptionHtml:
[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Updates[/color][/size][/b]
v3.0 - New version made for ENBSeries v121212. Added SSAO. SMAA is also added, as v121212 disables hardware anti-aliasing.
v2.2 - Added sunlight rays (ENB 0.113). Lights at night are slightly brighter.
v2.1 - Darker nights, slightly darker interiors, red haze in dungeons is corrected
v2.0 - Configured for ENB 0.112 KAGE.
v1.1 - Brighter nights and interiors, Matso's latest DOF version with subtle grain, minor tweaks.


[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Installation[/color][/size][/b]
[list][*]Download [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v121212.htm]ENBSeries v121212 for TES Skyrim[/url].
[*]Extract the file d3d9.dll to your Skyrim main folder (same as TESV.exe).
[*]Install Fimbulvinter ENB settings by manually copying the files to you Skyrim main folder.
[*]Make sure that bFloatPointRenderTarget is set to 1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini.
[*]Put the in-game brightness slider to the middle position.
[*]Use shift+F12 to turn the ENB on or off in-game.
[/list]

[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Depth of field effect[/color][/size][/b]
The DOF effect is enabled by default. To disable it, either:
[list][*]Use the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13306]ENB SSAO and DoF Toggler[/url] which let's you use a hotkey to turn the DOF effect on or off in-game.
[*]Open enbseries.ini and change EnableDepthOfField=true to EnableDepthOfField=false.
[/list]

[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Recommendations[/color][/size][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12454]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17416]Wearable Lanterns[/url]


[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Videos[/color][/size][/b]
[youtube]04HzaW6C4O4[/youtube][youtube]jHevQHlA_GA[/youtube]


[b][size=4][color=#AAAAAA]Credits[/color][/size][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3107253]Boris Vorontsov[/url] for ENBSeries.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=978335]HeliosDoubleSix[/url] for his [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142]Cinematic Lighting ENB[/url] which was the base for this ENB.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=151807]Matso[/url] for the depth of field effect.
author: 1000stenar
